Welcome Sonoma State University Alumni! 

Representing more than 74,000 graduates, the SSU Alumni Association awards student scholarships, hosts annual programs and scholarship fundraisers, supports campus and community events, and keeps graduates up to date on University news and events. 

The mission of the SSU Alumni Association is to foster, renew and enhance the relationship between alumni and the University. The Association is committed to providing service to Sonoma State University alumni as well as providing opportunities for alumni to volunteer, participate and support the advancement of SSU.
 
Thank you to our 22/23 corporate and community partners!

View All News







            Ming-Tung “Mike” Lee appointed interim president of Sonoma State University    July 11, 2022                 Sonoma State and partners awarded $18 million for Cradle-to-Career Collaborative    July 11, 2022                 Three alums working with world champions    July 11, 2022     










             "The prestigious Ambrose R. Nichols, Jr. Scholarship provided me with the financial relief needed to enhance my educational experience and continue to pursue my nursing degree at Sonoma State.This scholarship brings my family and I great ease and it means more than words can describe. I am a first generation college student, a Dreamer, and a DACA recipient and I am fortunate for the opportunity to defy generational barriers and to be a step closer to earning my BSN. "         Xiomara Espinoza- 22/23 Ambrose R. Nichols Scholarship Recipient                    “It is greatly an honor to have received this scholarship. This scholarship is dedicated to my parents, who have worked endlessly to allow me the opportunity they never had, of attending college. This scholarship means not only am I able to graduate with my bachelors degree debt free, but I am also able to continue my education to receive my credential, something that I never thought I would be able to do due to lack of financial support. This scholarship has allowed my family and I to continue dreaming, and for that, I am forever grateful."         Nataly Hernandez 22/23 Heart of SSU Scholarship Recipient       

Frequently Asked Questions 
     Where can I update my contact information?        Do you need to update your mailing address, email, or phone number? You can update any of your personal information here.              I need a copy of my transcripts or diploma       Need transcripts or a diploma? Visit the Office of the Registrar.              How do I volunteer?        Looking for volunteer opportunities?              Where can I find my constiuent ID?        Please email alumni@sonoma.edu to receive your constituent ID.              How do I donate?        There are many ways to support Sonoma State University and the Alumni Association. For a full list of giving opportunities, click here. Click the Alumni Association tile for a list of alumni specific giving opportunities.              Transportation and Parking       Find out information about transportation and parking.
